# Add fails when we're not in a module.
gocdk provision add dev blob/fileblob --> FAIL

gocdk init myproj
cd myproj

# Add fails for an invalid type.
gocdk provision add dev blob/foo --> FAIL

# Provision types that don't need any stdin.
# TODO(rvangent): Add the other types once they work without input.
gocdk provision add dev blob/fileblob
gocdk provision add dev runtimevar/filevar

cd biomes
ls dev
